item.title: 🔎Proposition-Based Retrieval This new paper by @tomchen0 introduces a new retrieval method by changing 🎯what is indexed🎯 in the first place T...
item.description:
🔎Proposition-Based Retrieval

This new paper by @tomchen0 introduces a new retrieval method by changing 🎯what is indexed🎯 in the first place

This can easily use our 🌲multi-vector retriever🌲, and we've added a template to get started with it easily!

💡How does it work? 👇… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735708004618764470

item.title: RT Ryuu: Exciting news! 🚀 Just launched my Personal Tutoring Bot 🤖📚 - Upload files, ask questions, get predictions for the next one, get quiz...
item.description:
RT Ryuu
Exciting news! 🚀 Just launched my Personal Tutoring Bot 🤖📚 - Upload files, ask questions, get predictions for the next one, get quizzes based on your files, Gives top topics and its details asked by all users. 🎓 Currently used by 30+ students at our college! 🌐✨ #EdTech #AI

Build your own Gemini Pro Chatbot
🤖@HeikoHotz guides you through creating your own #Gemini chatbot, that remembers without specialized hardware.

item.title: RT Colin McNamara: Come hack on @langchainAI with us tonight!
item.description:
RT Colin McNamara
Come hack on @langchainAI with us tonight!


Austin LangChain: 🚀 Join us at #AustinLangChain Meetup on Dec 14! Dive into AI Web Architecture with #LangChain, #Streamlit, & #Docker.
📍1204 San Antonio, Austin, TX.
⏰6-9 PM.
🔗 https://www.meetup.com/austin-langchain-ai-group/events/297837958/
#AI #WebDevelopment #AustinTech
👇 More details in the thread!

item.description:
RT AI Makerspace
🧑‍💻⚒️ Have you built with LangSmith yet?

It’s @LangChainAI's emerging best-practice #LLM Ops tool for deploying & operating LLM applications in production!

🤩Join us at 10 AM PT next week to talk LangSmith: How to Improve LLM Apps in #production.

https://lu.ma/Langsmithllmapps

item.description:
⭐️Video overview: Strategies for RAG on semi-structured data⭐️ 

We've seen great interest in RAG apps on docs w/ a mixture of tables and text (financial docs, whitepapers, technical manuals).

But, this brings up a few tricky questions:

item.title: 🦜📃Docugami KG-RAG Template We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs They als...
item.description:
🦜📃Docugami KG-RAG Template

We worked with @docugami to publish a RAG template that uses their technology to create XML knowledge graphs

They also benchmarked the RAG performance with LangSmith and found it outperformed OpenAI Assistant API

Read more: https://www.docugami.com/blog/kg-rag-langchain
item.author: LangChain

item.description:

LangChain without any wait quickly released a new Python package to access Google's multimodal LLM -Gemini!

item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
♊️ Google Gemini models in JS ♊️

Gemini multimodal models now integrate with @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS through @GoogleAI Studio!

Grab an API key and try them out with your favorite LangChain.js components.

Thank you to @alexalx13 for the 🏎️ quick PR!

item.title: Gemini ✨is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V? We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how wel...
item.description:
Gemini ✨is natively multimodal, but how does it stack up against GPT-4V?

We put gemini-pro-vision head-to-head with the reigning champ to see how well it could answer questions based on a multimodal slide deck.

The results?  Gemini seems to be a formidable model, matching… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735062294223274245
